description:
These soft, warm bib tights are a perfect winter training companion, offering exceptional water resistance and a comfortable chamois designed for comfort over long distances. Castelli's Nano Flex fabric is heat treated, with a DWR application that resists light precipitation. Ankle zippers make them easier to get into, and reflective cuffs add low light visibility.

  • Fabric is warm, soft and highly water-resistant
  • Reduced seams for improved comfort and fit
  • Mesh bib straps won't absorb moisture
  • Kiss Air2 seat pad for long-distance comfort
  • Ankle zippers for easy on and off
  • Reflective ankle cuffs
  • Durable embossed logos
name: Castelli Tutto Nano Bib Tights - Men's
